title: Person of Interest Highlight Reel and Season 5 Tease - Comic-Con 2015
author: IGN
comment: CBS has lost its mind if they want to cancel this show

This teaser was simply wonderful, so powerful, the combination of roots tragic voice and epic music does magic! Anyway, either if it is their last season or not, I am glad they are going to drop the procedural aspect of the show, I personally always stayed for the characters and the AI story. P.s should we assume Root leaves a message for shaw, because if that's the case it seems like shaw is not going to be involved in the story about fighting back. :(

Finch: Mr. Reese, We have another number.

Reese: Who is it this time?

Oh god. Chills. I miss this show so much. 

It's had some rough patches of late, in the last season (some incredible highpoints, too), but oh god, my body is ready for it to come back.<3
One of the best shows ever !
description: The team is on the run. With Samaritan's invisible grip tightening everywhere, is there any place left to hide? Relive the first four seasons of Person of Interest with this special video presentation inspired by the incredible fan video Ashley Zhang.
